title: Ticket #2789: [Debian] sftp-server varies by platform
description: In the sshd config file used for condor_ssh_to_job (src/condor_starter.V6.1/condor_ssh_to_job_sshd_config_template), the location of the sftp server is given as /usr/libexec/openssh/sftp-server. On the Mac, it's actually at /usr/libexec/sftp-server. On Debian, it's /usr/lib[64]/openssh/sftp-server.
